'''Oberon''' is an open-world [[NPC]] that can be found at the [[Scorchwind Trial Grounds]], [[Tezcatepetonco Range]], [[Natlan]]. He is a [[Qucusaurus Chick]], and is [[Taruka]]'s companion.

==Dialogue==
===Dialogue Set #1===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Lamizana, Taruka and Oberon before starting ''[[From One Case to Another]]'')
:'''Lamizana:''' Heh, you should really do something about your bad temper. I'm saying that for your good{{sic}}, alright? You're old enough to learn to be more sensible, for your sake, even if it isn't for your sister's.
:'''Oberon''': Cooo, Croooo.
:'''Lamizana:''' See? It agrees with me.
:'''Taruka''': Even if one of us had to lack sense, that person wouldn't be me.
:'''Lamizana:''' Hey! You brat...
{{Dialogue End}}

===Dialogue Set #2===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to  Oberon while indwelling a [[Saurian]] after completing ''[[From One Case to Another]]'')
:'''Oberon:''' Taruka so stingy! Just wanna eat teensy-weensy bit more, come on...
{{Dialogue End}}
